title: allal ellAm vilagi
sahitya:
allal ellAm vilagi Atma sutantarattil ayya nAn vAzha aruL iraivanE


anupallavi

  palgiya vinaigaLai paTruviTT-eppOdum pAlilnavanItam pOl padumattil annam pOl


caraNam    ayalonrum ninaiyAmal aghamukham kalaiyAmal aduvenum poruLinai iduvenr-arinduLLE
iyabAyirundapaDi iyalbAyinrundenrum ennuyirt-tuDippellAm unnuLLat-tuDippAgi
